 ***/export default function RegistrationForm(){const[fname,setFirstName]=useState('');const[lname,setLastName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[pword,setPassword]=useState('');const[season,setSeason]=useState('');const[errorMessages,setErrorMessages]=useState({});const navigate=useNavigate();const errors={};// submission
